description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 6 (Materials) of Reserved Matters Approval reference 18/6337/RMA dated 18/03/2019 (as amended by 20/1209/NMA, 20/5693/NMA, 21/5982/NMA and 23/0621/NMA) for of Plot 13 within Phase 1C sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the Comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area. The application has been submitted for the southern blocks (blocks E and F) within Plot 13 (known as Plot 203) as illustrated with the Brent Cross Town Plot 13 Planning Demise Areas submission document and seeks approval for: Sample areas of brickwork and mortar; Sample glazing with window/door frame) (including reveals and cills); and Balustrade and edge detail (including decking) only.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
